title: Xiaomi Wastes no Time with its First Launch for 2025
description: Meet the Redmi Turbo 4. The post Xiaomi Wastes no Time with its First Launch for 2025 appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: Xiaomi recently announced the unveiling of its new addition to the Redmi line with the Redmi 4 Turbo, a high-powered midrange smartphone. While it’s currently exclusive for Chinese markets, the phone is expected to launch soon as the POCO X7 for international markets, at a price that’s well below most other midrange smartphones. READ: The Redmi K80 is Affordable, and Comes with a Killer Chipset The phone is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Ultra, a 4nm chipset that’s accompanied by up to 512GB of internal storage and 16GB of RAM, and features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a peak brightness of 3,200 nits and 120Hz refresh rate. It’s got a sleek-looking chassis with an IP68 rating, as well as a camera setup headed by a 50MP main sensor in addition to an 8MP ultrawide lens, and a 20MP selfie camera. Other details include an optical in-display biometrics scanner, stereo speakers, as well as a 6,550 mAh battery with support for 90W fast charging. Available in black, white and blue, the phone starts at around 270 EUR (when converted). Source: GSMArena
